verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] nearing a go - or - no - go decision on North Korea talks , saying he 'll make a decision next week about the planned June 12 summit .
[ARG1: President Trump] is [V: nearing] [ARG2: a go - or - no - go decision on North Korea talks] , [ARGM-ADV: saying he 'll make a decision next week about the planned June 12 summit] .
President Trump is nearing a [V: go] - or - no - go decision [ARG1: on North Korea talks] , saying he 'll make a decision next week about the planned June 12 summit .
[ARG0: President Trump] is nearing a go - or - no - go decision on North Korea talks , [V: saying] [ARG1: he 'll make a decision next week about the planned June 12 summit] .
President Trump is nearing a go - or - no - go decision on North Korea talks , saying he [V: 'll] make a decision next week about the planned June 12 summit .

President Trump is nearing a go - or - no - go decision on North Korea talks , saying [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: 'll] [V: make] [ARG1: a decision] [ARGM-TMP: next week] [C-ARG1: about the planned June 12 summit] .
President Trump is nearing a go - or - no - go decision on North Korea talks , saying he 'll make a decision next week about the [V: planned] [ARG1: June 12 summit] .
